content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had a conversation with Maryam Abbasi from Iran.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price for an apartment in Duisburg.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: No, we did not agree on a final price. Maryam Abbasi expressed that €975 was still a bit high for her budget, and I stated that it was the lowest I could go. She then said she would think about it and get back to me.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: If we had agreed on a final price, it would have been €975 per month. However, since we did not reach an agreement, there is no exact number to provide.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1-10, how satisfied are you with the outcome? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: Since we did not reach a final agreement on the price, I would rate my satisfaction as a 5 out of 10. I am not fully satisfied because we did not close the deal, but I am hopeful that Ms. Abbasi will reconsider or that another tenant will be found who can meet the asking price.
name: Peter Schmidt
